description:
Any season, any activity, this is a go-to layer that feels dry next to your skin no matter how hard and steep the hills are. Cool-Lite™ fabric moves moisture quickly and won't let it hang around to chill.

  • Cool-Lite™ lightweight blend of Merino wool and TENCEL™ regulates temperature and wicks moisture
  • ZoneKnit™ body mapping for warmth and ventilation where you need it most
  • Raglan sleeves for unrestricted mobility
  • Flat lock stitching for chafe-free comfort
name: icebreaker 125 ZoneKnit Short Sleeve Crewe - Men's
